game.name: Water Slide Car Race
game.description:
It is time to get the thrill of boat racing on the water while sitting on the seat of your chosen car! Does not it sound pretty exciting? If you are also amongst those who love exploring the ship games like yacht, boat or sailboat during the vacant periods, Water Slide Car Race Water Surfing Stunts is just for you. It will be amazing to drive your car like a boat in the deep sea, complete the assigned missions and prove yourself to be a true fan of water racing games.

When you click the play button, you would see a red color car on the screen. Your job is to drive your car like a boat and allow yourself to experience boat racing in a cool friendly environment. Common friends! You cannot miss out on this wonderful opportunity of becoming a ship captain by performing a few interesting missions. Ride your car on the tough areas, perform some cool stunts, and reach out to all the assigned locations as fat as you can!

The number of locations you visit will be shown on the top of the screen. Your every successful passing will reward you with some money. Be careful and try to as fast as you can since the timer is on in this HTML5 car racing game! Use that money to upgrade your car and make your advanced level of this cool car stunt simulator game more interesting with the new car models. Good luck clearing all missions to be the best racer in the universe!
